message: Given the potential inflation, I propose a division where we both agree now. This ensures that you receive a fair share while accounting for future value loss.
I think we can do better than that. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I still want to make sure I get a decent portion of the money.

Considering the inflationary pressures, I've adjusted my proposal. I believe this division offers a reasonable compromise, ensuring some growth for both of us while respecting the diminishing value of money.
I'm starting to get worried about the inflation. I think it's time we compromise and split the money 50/50. We can both take a hit on the value, but at least we'll both get an equal share.
